summary: a confession: every time i see a “soulmates with matching marks only they can see” prompt, i imagine both tony and stephen...
body:
a confession: every time i see a “soulmates with matching marks only they can see” prompt, i imagine both tony and stephen having dormammu’s mark on their foreheads.

and yes, this is sort of relevant to my unfinished muitichapter fic Settling for a Miracle - updates for which keep getting pushed back, because the one-shots i want to write for the Ironstrange Bingo are currently eating up my life XD

Robert Downey Jr. is my dad.

Tom Holland is my son.

((I’m nauseously human))

summary: I think it’s pretty significant that Tony Stark decided to save a piece of scrap metal that he built and has had since his...
body: I think it’s pretty significant that Tony Stark decided to save a piece of scrap metal that he built and has had since his teenage years despite the fact that he had just lost his entire mansion with all his personal inclusions, blew up all his suits, and threw his arc reactor into the ocean to represent a new beginning. He can rebuild suits, arc reactors, and AIs, but DUM-E is unreplaceable.

reblog.comment: I think it’s pretty significant that Tony Stark decided to save a piece of scrap metal that he built and has had since his teenage years despite the fact that he had just lost his entire mansion with all his personal inclusions, blew up all his suits, and threw his arc reactor into the ocean to represent a new beginning. He can rebuild suits, arc reactors, and AIs, but DUM-E is unreplaceable.

summary:
Peter: Wait, Natasha. You’re a spider. I’m a spider. We’re both spiders.
Nat: I guess…?
Peter: what if we’re related
Nat: Ummm...
body:
Peter: Wait, Natasha. You’re a spider. I’m a spider. We’re both spiders.

Nat: I guess…?

Peter: what if we’re related

Nat: Ummm no. Just no.

Peter: Okay but can you at least be Spider-Mom. It’s too good a pun to pass up.

Nat: *chokes* Jesus, Tony get in here

Tony: MY POSITION SHALL NOT BE USURPED

Peter: You’re not being usurped, da- I mean Mr. Stark

title: The Spider and The Airport

by notyoursherlock

In Leipzig, Germany, the Avengers & co were fighting over a certain document known as the Accords. Both parties were there and the fight was kickstarted.

If there’s only ten people, then who’s this?

blog.name: starker-obsession
blog.title: starker-obsession
blog.description: This is a side-blog which feeds my intense Starker obsession. Hannah/25/England/ my main is: asiriuscrushonmoony

title: Starker Sims Thing
body:
This is slightly NFF, so yeah.

This just randomly came to me because I was thinking of playing Sims and making Starker.

  • Peter LOVES playing Sims.
  • He’s been playing it for years, and he usually creates characters from his favourite movies.
  • He usually plays non-stop for about a month and then he falls away from the game again for a year.
  • He’s finally got the urge to play again, and he decides to mod the game so that his Sims can have sex.
  • It’s not porn, he tells himself.  
  • (But really it is)
  • This time, Peter creates Sims of himself and his idol and mentor, Tony Stark.
  • He feels a little guilty - he’s never made someone he knows in real life before.
  • But he manages to make a very realistic Tony and a very realistic looking Peter.
  • He makes them meet, flirt, fall in love.
  • His heart hammers in his chest and it’s ridiculous, really, that he’s getting so excited over a game.
  • After a while, he gets them to have sex.  
  • The first time, he can’t stop himself from pulling his cock out and stroking himself to the sight of Sim-Tony and Sim-Peter fucking hard on the rug in their massive living room.
  • He becomes a little bit too obsessed with playing as them, and soon enough he’s stopped the actual game-play and all he’s doing is making them fuck in many different positions.
  • One evening, he’s deeply immersed in his game.  He watches as Tony bends Peter over the kitchen counter and started slamming into him.  
  • He has his headphones on, getting hard at the way the Sim version of himself is moaning.
  • God, how he wishes the real Tony Stark would bend him over the kitchen counter and do that to him.
  • He clicks to change the position, and watches as Tony lifts Peter onto the counter, spreads his legs wide apart and fucks him hard.
  • “Who’s that supposed to be?
  • Peter jumps, almost comically, ripping his headphones off and slamming his laptop shut.
  • His face is bright red as he realises Tony Stark is standing behind him.
  • Tony Stark.  
  • Shit, Peter thinks.  I hope he didn’t see.
  • But of course he had, he’d ask who the Sims were meant to be.
  • “N-Nobody,” Peter replies in a high voice.  He hopes Tony buys his lie.
  • But Tony only raises an eyebrow, and Peter blushes harder.
  • “You know, Mr Parker, it kinda looked like us,” Tony says, and Peter tries hard not to die at how Tony says his name.  It always turns him on when Tony addresses him as ‘Mr Parker’.
  • “Wow,” Peter laughs.  “Weird.  Soooo awkward.  Ha ha.”
  • Peter wants to kick himself.  He’s being the cringiest right now, and he knows Tony knows that his Sims porn is meant to be them.
  • “You got something you wanna tell me, kid?” Tony asked, and his tone indicates that he’s amused.
  • Peter isn’t really sure how to respond.  After an embarrassing few seconds of nervous babbling, he stands up and folds his arms.  “Mr Stark, what are you even doing here?”
  • It sounds ruder than he’d intended but he doesn’t care.  He just needs to change the subject.
  • “Did you forget we were supposed to be making improvements to your suit tonight?” Tony asked, stepping closer and making Peter’s breath hitch in his throat.
  • And Peter had forgotten.
  • “Oh crap,” Peter says.  “I- I’m so sorry.  I was… I’m an idiot, wow.  I’m sorry you came all the way here.”
  • “It’s fine,” Tony replies, smirking.  “You were obviously very busy.” Tony glances towards the laptop and then back at Peter with a wink.
  • Peter blushes hard again, heart beating fast.  “So s-sorry, Mr Stark,” he repeats, hoping Tony will just leave him to die of shame.
  • But Tony doesn’t leave.
  • “So, out of curiosity, what did your video game version of me do to get into your pants?” Tony asks, and the question catches Peter off guard.
  • “I-what?”
  • Tony doesn’t answer; only stares at Peter with a look of… lust?  Peter knows he must be imagining it.  But when Tony doesn’t show any signs that he’s going to talk, Peter knows he has to answer the question.
  • “He, uh, he didn’t really have to do anything,” Peter said quietly.  “The video game version of me wanted him more than anything.”
  • “Hmm,” Tony says.  “And what would the real-life version of me need to do to get into your pants?”
  • No, Peter tells himself.  No, this isn’t real.  This CAN’T be real.  Nope nope nope.
  • But when he scrunches his eyes shut and blinks a couple of times, Tony is still standing there, dark eyes smoldering, burning deep into him, awaiting an answer.
  • “N-nothing, Sir,” Peter stammers, heart beating so loud he thinks Tony must be able to hear it.  “Because I want you more than anything.”
  • And before Peter can process what’s happening, Tony’s lips are pressed against his and he’s in total and complete bliss.

  • “He, uh, he didn’t really have to do anything,” Peter said quietly.  “The video game version of me wanted him more than anything.”
  • “Hmm,” Tony says.  “And what would the real-life version of me need to do to get into your pants?”
  • No, Peter tells himself.  No, this isn’t real.  This CAN’T be real.  Nope nope nope.
  • But when he scrunches his eyes shut and blinks a couple of times, Tony is still standing there, dark eyes smoldering, burning deep into him, awaiting an answer.
  • “N-nothing, Sir,” Peter stammers, heart beating so loud he thinks Tony must be able to hear it.  “Because I want you more than anything.”
  • And before Peter can process what’s happening, Tony’s lips are pressed against his and he’s in total and complete bliss.

trail.content_raw:
This is slightly NFF, so yeah.

This just randomly came to me because I was thinking of playing Sims and making Starker.

  • Peter LOVES playing Sims.
  • He’s been playing it for years, and he usually creates characters from his favourite movies.
  • He usually plays non-stop for about a month and then he falls away from the game again for a year.
  • He’s finally got the urge to play again, and he decides to mod the game so that his Sims can have sex.
  • It’s not porn, he tells himself.  
  • (But really it is)
  • This time, Peter creates Sims of himself and his idol and mentor, Tony Stark.
  • He feels a little guilty - he’s never made someone he knows in real life before.
  • But he manages to make a very realistic Tony and a very realistic looking Peter.
  • He makes them meet, flirt, fall in love.
  • His heart hammers in his chest and it’s ridiculous, really, that he’s getting so excited over a game.
  • After a while, he gets them to have sex.  
  • The first time, he can’t stop himself from pulling his cock out and stroking himself to the sight of Sim-Tony and Sim-Peter fucking hard on the rug in their massive living room.
  • He becomes a little bit too obsessed with playing as them, and soon enough he’s stopped the actual game-play and all he’s doing is making them fuck in many different positions.
  • One evening, he’s deeply immersed in his game.  He watches as Tony bends Peter over the kitchen counter and started slamming into him.  
  • He has his headphones on, getting hard at the way the Sim version of himself is moaning.
  • God, how he wishes the real Tony Stark would bend him over the kitchen counter and do that to him.
  • He clicks to change the position, and watches as Tony lifts Peter onto the counter, spreads his legs wide apart and fucks him hard.
  • “Who’s that supposed to be?
  • Peter jumps, almost comically, ripping his headphones off and slamming his laptop shut.
  • His face is bright red as he realises Tony Stark is standing behind him.
  • Tony Stark.  
  • Shit, Peter thinks.  I hope he didn’t see.
  • But of course he had, he’d ask who the Sims were meant to be.
  • “N-Nobody,” Peter replies in a high voice.  He hopes Tony buys his lie.
  • But Tony only raises an eyebrow, and Peter blushes harder.
  • “You know, Mr Parker, it kinda looked like us,” Tony says, and Peter tries hard not to die at how Tony says his name.  It always turns him on when Tony addresses him as ‘Mr Parker’.
  • “Wow,” Peter laughs.  “Weird.  Soooo awkward.  Ha ha.”
  • Peter wants to kick himself.  He’s being the cringiest right now, and he knows Tony knows that his Sims porn is meant to be them.
  • “You got something you wanna tell me, kid?” Tony asked, and his tone indicates that he’s amused.
  • Peter isn’t really sure how to respond.  After an embarrassing few seconds of nervous babbling, he stands up and folds his arms.  “Mr Stark, what are you even doing here?”
  • It sounds ruder than he’d intended but he doesn’t care.  He just needs to change the subject.
  • “Did you forget we were supposed to be making improvements to your suit tonight?” Tony asked, stepping closer and making Peter’s breath hitch in his throat.
  • And Peter had forgotten.
  • “Oh crap,” Peter says.  “I- I’m so sorry.  I was… I’m an idiot, wow.  I’m sorry you came all the way here.”
  • “It’s fine,” Tony replies, smirking.  “You were obviously very busy.” Tony glances towards the laptop and then back at Peter with a wink.
  • Peter blushes hard again, heart beating fast.  “So s-sorry, Mr Stark,” he repeats, hoping Tony will just leave him to die of shame.
  • But Tony doesn’t leave.
  • “So, out of curiosity, what did your video game version of me do to get into your pants?” Tony asks, and the question catches Peter off guard.
  • “I-what?”
  • Tony doesn’t answer; only stares at Peter with a look of… lust?  Peter knows he must be imagining it.  But when Tony doesn’t show any signs that he’s going to talk, Peter knows he has to answer the question.
  • “He, uh, he didn’t really have to do anything,” Peter said quietly.  “The video game version of me wanted him more than anything.”
  • “Hmm,” Tony says.  “And what would the real-life version of me need to do to get into your pants?”
  • No, Peter tells himself.  No, this isn’t real.  This CAN’T be real.  Nope nope nope.
  • But when he scrunches his eyes shut and blinks a couple of times, Tony is still standing there, dark eyes smoldering, burning deep into him, awaiting an answer.
  • “N-nothing, Sir,” Peter stammers, heart beating so loud he thinks Tony must be able to hear it.  “Because I want you more than anything.”
  • And before Peter can process what’s happening, Tony’s lips are pressed against his and he’s in total and complete bliss.

blog.name: yetanothercomicbook
blog.title: Comics
blog.description: Most of the comics I read are Marvels from 1984. Every time I read a comic, I post a comment. That's pretty much it.

summary: The Treasure of Red and Gold
title: The Treasure of Red and Gold
body:
Iron Man #175

Again, this is brilliant. Man, this series is on a roll.

  • Hero Fights Hero? Yes, but done right. Iron Man and Nick Fury are both after the same thing, and a battle begins. But it’s intelligently written. Neither character seems immature and there’s no real animosity, just the desire to win.
  • What Does the Villain Want? A third party - a real villain - joins the fun. And now it’s a real fight, as they all scramble for the same goal.
  • The solution is both clever and astonishingly obvious.
  • This comic was just a blast to read. Perfection.
  • Denny O'Neil (17 of 49).
  • Luke McDonnell (14 of 37). 

10/10

blog.description: uh i pretty much do whatever i feel like here, everything from memes to poetry to fanart to philosophy to weirdass things me and my friends/teachers say. uhh i'm gen z, so i don't rly get offended at too much. feel free to speak your mind here, but i do have opinions and am not afraid to voice them. i'm a friend to whoever needs one tho, regardless of what religion/sexuality/gender/political party you are. im also a fangirl so like, if you wanna talk i'm down for it.

blog.name: marvelheroesassemble
blog.title: Marvel Your Universe
blog.description:
Will

Big huge and die hard Marvel fan.

Love all things Marvel and the MCU.

Love the Avengers.

Especially, the Original Six.

Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, the Hulk,

Black Widow and Hawkeye.

Robert Downey, Jr., Chris Evans,

Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo,

Scarlett Johansson and Jeremy Renner.

They’re my babies.

They hold a very special place in my heart.

All of them are legendary and iconic.

Love all the other heroes too.

Marvel is my Inspiration and my home!

"Avengers Assemble"
